document.full_text: ivory coast president alassane ouattara won the backing of his defeated rival's army chiefs while the eu and the world bank pledged financial support to help end the country's prolonged divisions.
document.title: support may boost ouattara chances in ivory coast
lines_and_colors: ivory coast president alassane ouattara won the backing of his defeated rival's army chiefs while the eu and the world bank pledged financial support to help end the country's prolonged divisions.
